<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dwarven Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dwarf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=54" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 36 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your kin have instilled in you an affinity for hard-hitting weapons, and you prefer these to more elegant arms. You are trained with the [battle axe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=16), [pick](/Weapons.aspx?ID=34), and [warhammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=47).

 You also gain access to all uncommon [dwarf](/Traits.aspx?ID=54) weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial dwarf weapons are simple weapons and advanced dwarf weapons are martial weapons.

<title level="2">Dwarven Weapon Familiarity leads to...</title>
[Dwarven Weapon Cunning](/Feats.aspx?ID=8), [Dwarven Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=11)
name: Dwarven Weapon Familiarity
